pages.text: $(li)You can just place the egg on the ground right clicking while you are holding an egg on your hand.$(br)$(li)With enought time, the egg will hatch into a Turtle.
$(li)Turtle Eggs are a valious ingredient for a numerous kind of food recipes.$(br)$(li)Pie$(li)Cake$(li)Tart$(li)Pancake$(li)Pudding$(li)Scrambled Egg$(li)Fried egg$(li)Aether-Glazed Cupcake
